messages.content: You are an expert in semantic role labeling

Predicates.description: The verb or action that the sentence is about. In "Mary sold the book to John," the predicate is 'sold'

Arguments.description: A word or phrase that fulfills a semantic role related to the predicate. Arguments are often noun phrases.

Semantic Roles.description: A label that describes the underlying relationship between the predicate and an argument.

value.description: Relative or absolute time range, e.g. '1 year', '2023-01-01'
